No tagline found, using genaric tagline. Previous rev. are bg while this one is bgn ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.foxnetwork.ru/index.php/en/component/content/article/119-asus-rt-g32-rev-c1-and-rt-n10-revb1.html ''Asus RT-G32 rev. C1 and RT-N10 rev. B1'' on '''FoxNetwork'''] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== {{DDWRT |techdata = |wikipage = |forumpage = http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=69988 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = ? |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = :DD-WRT support, use dd-wrt firmware for asus-rt-n10+. }} Please insert instructions here ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|wassupported}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/asus/asus_rt-g32_c1 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/asus/rt-g32 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ramips |subtarget = rt305x |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = 12.09 |current_supported_version = 18.06.9 |image_too_big = |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ===Flashing Wive-NG=== *[http://wive-ng.sourceforge.net/?WR-NL_RT3050%282%29:Sovmestimye_ustroystva Wive-NG Firmware] :Wive-NG support, native support fastpath NAT. ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 
          J2
(RxD) (TxD) (GND) (3.3)

<--- To RT3050
---> To PWR
